Title: Come immediately into action to wage a great battle to seize coal
Designer: Zhejiang gong nong bing huabaoshe (浙江工农兵画报社)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: The slogan in the background calls for changing the practice of digging coal in the North and transporting it to the South (改变北煤南运).
